alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 03 at 12:50AM PST until January 03 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 25 mph, with gusts 35 to 45 mph, except easterly near Troutdale. Gusts up to 50 mph are possible on exposed hills and ridges in Willamette Valley south of Woodburn. * WHERE...In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. In Oregon, South Willamette Valley, Central Willamette Valley and Greater Portland Metro Area. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Spotty power outages likely. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS: Winds in the Northern Willamette Valley will ease first, after about 2 AM.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
